video.title: UNC Asheville Bulldogs vs. South Carolina Upstate Spartans: Game Highlights

article.headline: UNC Asheville defeats South Carolina Upstate 77-64

images.name: UNC Asheville Bulldogs vs. South Carolina Upstate Spartans: Game Highlights
images.caption: UNC Asheville Bulldogs vs. South Carolina Upstate Spartans: Game Highlights

article.linkText: UNC Asheville defeats South Carolina Upstate 77-64
article.story: SPARTANBURG, S.C. -- — Drew Pember scored 28 points as UNC Asheville beat South Carolina Upstate 77-64 on Saturday night. Pember added 16 rebounds for the Bulldogs (17-9, 9-2 Big South Conference). Caleb Burgess scored 14 points while shooting 4 of 7 from the field and 5 for 8 from the line, and added five assists. Nicholas McMullen had 12 points and shot 5 of 8 from the field and 2 for 3 from the line. Jalen Breazeale led the Spartans (8-16, 3-8) in scoring, finishing with 13 points and four assists. Justin Bailey added 11 points and six rebounds for South Carolina Upstate. In addition, Nick Alves had 11 points. Both teams play on Wednesday. UNC Asheville hosts Presbyterian and South Carolina Upstate travels to play High Point. ------ The Associated Press created this story using technology provided by Data Skrive and data from Sportradar.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.
